text:
="preserve">Angelo Fagiani (18 April 1943 – 4 July 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic archbishops. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1967. He was archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Camerino-San Severino Marche, Italy, from 1999 until 2007.
Fagiani died on 4 July 2020, aged 77.

annotations.surface_form: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Camerino-San Severino Marche
